A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Marketing > Storytelling 
Film filled with plot holes and 1980's movie cliches. Played it completely safe and even went backwards in story. Too much humor. Constantly uses the "last minute save cliche."
Feels like more went into marketing than good story telling. A better story will make more money. The marketing isnt needed for something already so popular. 


The movie makes a joke out of itself at the many serious moments. Poor use of developed characters - snoke and the storm trooper. Luke is hiding\, but he leaves a map to find him...
